channel.title: Reality - Updated 7/27/09
channel.description:
I started a server.
I did some stuff.
UPDATE: 7/27/09
Among other thing's, I have added some IRC intergration (since a majority of the dev team hangs out on the IRC). Credits to AMERIKA for the IDEA of adding IRC intergration.
Picture of IRC Intergration:
[url=http://a.imagehost.org/view/0394/ircint][img]http://a.imagehost.org/0394/ircint.png[/img][/url]
There is more then just that, but cbf with pictures :)
_______________________________________________________________________________
[quote="Newty"]Oh yeah, I forgot. This is an edited Woeshiescape (delta) base. Packaged it, cleaned it out, etc.[/quote]
Proof:
[url=http://a.imagehost.org/view/0082/coal][img]http://a.imagehost.org/0082/coal.png[/img][/url]
Coal Mining Spot, you have to be 60 mining to be teleported there. Or you can walk :p
[url=http://h.imagehost.org/view/0789/home][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0789/home.png[/img][/url]
Camelot Castle/Excalibur Quest. Once you complete the quest you have access to the castle
[url=http://h.imagehost.org/view/0690/home2][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0690/home2.png[/img][/url]
The home of Reality/King's Bow Quest
[url=http://h.imagehost.org/view/0082/pick][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0082/pick.png[/img][/url]
Coal Mining/Pickaxe quest. Once completed Hans will buy all of your coal
[url=http://h.imagehost.org/view/0893/quests][img]http://h.imagehost.org/0893/quests.png[/img][/url]
3 quests
[url=http://a.imagehost.org/view/0645/aquest][img]http://a.imagehost.org/0645/aquest.png[/img][/url]
What a quest looks like
Thread to be edited, I'm not much for dev threads so if someone could make one for me..
I am taking all suggestions, I need ideas of what to add to each city. I plan on adding at least one quest to each city as well as multiple stores and training areas.
Goals: Economy based server. Stable. Clean and easy to program. Full of contenct.
Like I said, please give me as many suggestions as possible!

item.title: Reality - Updated 7/27/09
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“AMERIKA, post:58, topic:290928”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=384621.msg2897680#msg2897680 date=1249321850]
He’s attempting to do highscores at the moment (I’m only posting because he can’t :P) - though it’s not really working out good, we had to remove them because every time one logged out, the whole server disconnected and needed to be restarted before any others could log in again, other than that, the stability and content is wonderful
[/quote]

No, he just went on google and took someone else’s Highscore PHP codes. Look:

[quote=http://realityscape.hostzi.com/highscore/]
Created and released by Segadora
Released under GNU license, you may change everything, just dont remove credits.
http://segadora.org[/quote]

He cbf to do a thing, and from what I heard, he is in it just for the ad clicks Gg, newty.[/quote]I never said he was going to or did make it from scratch, his fixing bugs.

Read full topic
